import React,{lazy,Suspense,useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Route,Routes}from"react-router-dom";import LoderPageApp from'./components/loaderTwo/LodaerPageApp';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HeaderPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/Header')));const HomePage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/Home')));const CatigoriesListPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/CatigoriesList')));const MealsCat=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/meals')));const SingleMealDetailes=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/MealDetailes')));const ContactPage=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/Contact')));const Footer=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/FooterII')));const MealSearch=/*#__PURE__*/lazy(()=>delayForDemo(import('./components/MealSearch')));function App(){const[category,setCategory]=useState([]);const[meals,setMeals]=useState([]);//Get All Gategories
const getCategory=async()=>{const data=await axios.get('https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/categories.php');setCategory(data.data.categories);};useEffect(()=>{getCategory();setMeals();},[]);const search=async word=>{if(word===""){setMeals([]);}else{const data=await axios.get(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=${word}`);setMeals(data.data.meals);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoderPageApp,{}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderPage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{search:search}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MealSearch,{meals:meals}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CatigoriesListPage,{category:category})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/category/:categoryName",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MealsCat,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/category/meal/:mealId",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SingleMealDetailes,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactPage,{})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}function delayForDemo(promise){return new Promise(resolve=>{setTimeout(resolve,500);}).then(()=>promise);}export default App;
